title: Virtual Environment-Based Mathematics Education Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A corporate re-education course for mathematics teachers, emphasizing hands-on learning through virtual environments (MUVE) and supplemented by blog-based reflective activities.

learning_goals: Conduct mathematical problem-solving simulation activities with over 80% participation in a virtual environment.
Submit reflections on virtual learning experiences and educational application plans via weekly blog posts with over 90% completion.
Achieve 75+ points (out of 100) in formative assessments for virtual environment-based lesson design capabilities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
